description: Dataset of legal document templates for the Pre-Legal platform

templates.name: Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA)
templates.description: A mutual or one-way agreement to protect confidential information shared between parties.

templates.name: Mutual Non-Disclosure Agreement
templates.description: A bilateral agreement where both parties share and protect each other's confidential information under symmetric obligations.

templates.name: Employment Contract
templates.description: A standard contract of employment setting out terms and conditions between an employer and employee.

templates.name: Service Agreement
templates.description: A contract between a service provider and a client defining scope of work, deliverables, and payment terms.

templates.name: Residential Tenancy Agreement
templates.description: A lease agreement between a landlord and tenant for the rental of residential property.

templates.name: Terms of Service
templates.description: Website or application terms of service governing how users may access and use a product or platform.
